Title: Maria Full of Grace
Production_Co: HBO Films, Fine Line Features, Journeyman Pictures
Cast: Catalina Sandino Moreno, Virgina Ariza, Yenny Paola Vega, Rodrigo Sánchez Borhorquez, Charles Albert Patiño, Wilson Guerrero, Johanna Andrea Mora, Fabricio Suarez, Mateo Suarez, Evangelina Morales, Juana Guarderas, John Álex Toro, Jaime Osorio Gómez, Guilied Lopez, Victor Macias
Plot: A pregnant Colombian teenager becomes a drug mule to make some desperately needed money for her family. In a small village in Colombia, the pregnant seventeen years old Maria supports her family with her salary working in a floriculture. She is fired and with a total lack of perspective of finding a new job, she decides to accept the offer to work as a drug mule, flying to USA with sixty-two pellets of cocaine in her stomach. Once in New York, things do not happen as planned. Written by Stephen Bowen
Keywords: drug mule, stomach, money, colombian, colombia
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 40 wins & 32 nominations.
Location: New York City, New York, USA
Actors: Catalina Sandino Moreno, Guilied Lopez, Orlando Tobón
Description: Directed by Joshua Marston.  With Catalina Sandino Moreno, Guilied Lopez, Orlando Tobón, Virgina Ariza. A pregnant Colombian teenager becomes a drug mule to make some desperately needed money for her family.
